content:
Topic A Study on Active Learning for Improving Object Detection Model in Home Care System Using Limited Amount of Data
About Our Lab I am a member of NTHU Vision Science Lab (VSLAB) instructed by Prof. Min Sun.
Motivation In recent years, the population of the elderly keeps increasing. Therefore, our lab founded CarePLUS Group with the aim to develop a home care system, monitoring the action of the elderly and detect whether they are in danger using computer vision. Besides, the home care system will remind them to take medicine and do exercise regularly.
Objective Our goal is to improve the performance of object detection model by finding out frames that are more valuable.Within a limited amount of data, we construct “Active Sample” algorithm by Active Learning to achieve this goal.
Result Awards We won the FIRST PLACE of poster-voting competition.
Documents report
abstract
poster
repository

title: Undergraduate Research

content:
I come from Taichung, a heartwarming city in central Taiwan.
I spent my high school years in class of math and science gifted students at Taichung Municipal Taichung Second Senior High School, during which I made many good friends and obtained countless amazing memories.
At July 2018, I finished my ultimate mission in high school — Advanced Subjects Test — and was luckily admitted to Department of Electrical Engineering at National Tsing Hua University (NTHU EE).
After some semesters, I gradually found that I prefer software courses to hardware ones. Thus, I took some CS-related courses, such as computer architecture, data structure, etc. I also applied for internship as a software engineer at Industrial Technology Research Institute (ITRI). Besides, I joined MeiChu Hackathon Competition and won the first place in October, 2020. The sense of achievement gives me the motivation to keep working hard. For details, you can visit my posts.
Moreover, I joined NTHU EE Camp in July 2019 and 2020, during which I enjoyed a good time and made so many good friends. I am also the activities director of NTHU EE Student Association. Both experiences left a deep imperssion on me.
Last but not least, I’m a fan of the famous pop band — Mayday. Their music not only provides me an outlet for my tension but encourages me all the time so that I can endure my pressure. How lucky am I to live in the same era with Mayday!
summary:
I come from Taichung, a heartwarming city in central Taiwan.
I spent my high school years in class of math and science gifted students at Taichung Municipal Taichung Second Senior High School, during which I made many good friends and obtained countless amazing memories.
At July 2018, I finished my ultimate mission in high school — Advanced Subjects Test — and was luckily admitted to Department of Electrical Engineering at National Tsing Hua University (NTHU EE).
title: Self Introduction
